events.name: EV battery supply chain
events.wd_description: The manufacturing process of EV batteries involves several stages, including extracting mineral ores, refining, synthesizing materials, battery cell production, and recycling.
events.description: The manufacturing process of EV batteries involves several stages, including extracting mineral ores, refining, synthesizing materials, battery cell production, and recycling.

events.name: Mineral extraction
events.wd_description: The initial stage in the EV battery supply chain, involving the extraction of necessary mineral ores such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel.
events.description: The initial stage in the EV battery supply chain, involving the extraction of necessary mineral ores such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel.

events.name: Lithium extraction
events.wd_description: The process of extracting lithium, a critical raw material for battery production, primarily dominated by China.
events.description: The process of extracting lithium, a critical raw material for battery production, primarily dominated by China.

events.name: Cobalt extraction
events.wd_description: The extraction of cobalt, used in super-alloys, hard metals, and catalysts, though its usage has decreased with the rise of nickel.
events.description: The extraction of cobalt, used in super-alloys, hard metals, and catalysts, though its usage has decreased with the rise of nickel.

events.name: Nickel extraction
events.wd_description: Nickel extraction, essential for stainless steel production and requiring highly pure-grade nickel for battery production.
events.description: Nickel extraction, essential for stainless steel production and requiring highly pure-grade nickel for battery production.

events.name: Refining
events.wd_description: The refining stage involves processing extracted ores into usable forms, crucial for subsequent material synthesis.
events.description: The refining stage involves processing extracted ores into usable forms, crucial for subsequent material synthesis.

events.name: Material synthesis
events.wd_description: Synthesis of materials like cathodes and anodes from refined minerals, determining battery performance.
events.description: Synthesis of materials like cathodes and anodes from refined minerals, determining battery performance.

events.name: Cathode synthesis
events.wd_description: Creation of cathode materials, where nickel and iron-based chemistries play a critical role in battery performance.
events.description: Creation of cathode materials, where nickel and iron-based chemistries play a critical role in battery performance.

events.name: Anode synthesis
events.wd_description: Production of anode materials, predominantly using graphite, which is supplied mainly by China.
events.description: Production of anode materials, predominantly using graphite, which is supplied mainly by China.

events.name: Battery cell production
events.wd_description: The production of battery cells from synthesized cathode and anode materials, a key phase in the supply chain.
events.description: The production of battery cells from synthesized cathode and anode materials, a key phase in the supply chain.

events.name: Recycling
events.wd_description: The final stage, involving the recycling of used batteries to recover valuable materials for reuse.
events.description: The final stage, involving the recycling of used batteries to recover valuable materials for reuse.

events.name: Global leaders in EV battery supply chain
events.wd_label: Global leaders in EV battery supply chain
events.wd_description: Different countries' roles in the EV battery supply chain, highlighting China's dominance and contributions from Europe, the US, South Korea, and Japan.
events.description: Different countries' roles in the EV battery supply chain, highlighting China's dominance and contributions from Europe, the US, South Korea, and Japan.

events.name: China
events.wd_description: China dominates the EV battery supply chain with significant production capacities for both positive and negative electrode materials.
events.description: China dominates the EV battery supply chain with significant production capacities for both positive and negative electrode materials.

events.name: Positive electrode materials
events.wd_description: China produces 70% of the world's positive electrode materials for EV batteries.
events.description: China produces 70% of the world's positive electrode materials for EV batteries.

events.name: Negative electrode materials
events.wd_description: China accounts for 85% of the global production capacity of negative electrode materials for EV batteries.
events.description: China accounts for 85% of the global production capacity of negative electrode materials for EV batteries.

events.name: Europe
events.wd_description: Europe has made strides in EV production but lags in other aspects of the battery supply chain.
events.description: Europe has made strides in EV production but lags in other aspects of the battery supply chain.

events.name: US
events.wd_description: The US has a minimal contribution to the global EV battery supply chain but is focusing on developing its own supply chains.
events.description: The US has a minimal contribution to the global EV battery supply chain but is focusing on developing its own supply chains.

events.name: South Korea
events.wd_description: South Korea has significant involvement in the downstream raw material processing supply chain for EV batteries.
events.description: South Korea has significant involvement in the downstream raw material processing supply chain for EV batteries.

events.name: Japan
events.wd_description: Japan also has a notable presence in the EV battery supply chain, particularly in raw material processing.
events.description: Japan also has a notable presence in the EV battery supply chain, particularly in raw material processing.

events.name: Industrial policies outlook
events.wd_description: Industrial policies adopted by various nations to strengthen their positions in the integrated battery supply chains.
events.description: Industrial policies adopted by various nations to strengthen their positions in the integrated battery supply chains.

events.name: China
events.wd_description: China’s forward-thinking policies have secured a dominant position in the global EV industry, holding a 77% market share.
events.description: China’s forward-thinking policies have secured a dominant position in the global EV industry, holding a 77% market share.

events.name: Japan
events.wd_description: Japan holds 4% of the global production capacity for EV batteries and has unveiled significant financial initiatives.
events.description: Japan holds 4% of the global production capacity for EV batteries and has unveiled significant financial initiatives.

events.name: Korea
events.wd_description: Korea has 5% of the global production capacity and has launched significant financial initiatives to bolster its presence in the battery and EV industries.
events.description: Korea has 5% of the global production capacity and has launched significant financial initiatives to bolster its presence in the battery and EV industries.

events.name: European Union
events.wd_description: The European Union has invested significantly in R&D to develop an integrated battery manufacturing industry, though it will take time to establish supply chains.
events.description: The European Union has invested significantly in R&D to develop an integrated battery manufacturing industry, though it will take time to establish supply chains.

events.name: US
events.wd_description: The US has intensified efforts to develop indigenous supply chains for EVs and batteries, leveraging its automotive and mineral resource industries.
events.description: The US has intensified efforts to develop indigenous supply chains for EVs and batteries, leveraging its automotive and mineral resource industries.

events.name: Indonesia
events.wd_description: Indonesia is strategically focusing on battery and EV production, leveraging its geographical advantages to attract investments from major EV producers.
events.description: Indonesia is strategically focusing on battery and EV production, leveraging its geographical advantages to attract investments from major EV producers.

events.name: Thailand
events.wd_description: Thailand is concentrating on producing batteries, EVs, and distributing materials, maintaining close ties with the Asian market to attract investments.
events.description: Thailand is concentrating on producing batteries, EVs, and distributing materials, maintaining close ties with the Asian market to attract investments.

events.name: Critical materials for EV batteries
events.wd_description: The demand for critical materials such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel has increased due to their essential roles in battery production.
events.description: The demand for critical materials such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel has increased due to their essential roles in battery production.

events.name: Lithium
events.wd_description: Lithium is a critical raw material for EV batteries, with China dominating its supply.
events.description: Lithium is a critical raw material for EV batteries, with China dominating its supply.

events.name: Cobalt
events.wd_description: Cobalt is used in the fabrication of super-alloys, hard metals, and catalysts, though its usage has decreased with the rise of nickel.
events.description: Cobalt is used in the fabrication of super-alloys, hard metals, and catalysts, though its usage has decreased with the rise of nickel.

events.name: Nickel
events.wd_description: Nickel, particularly class-1 nickel with a purity greater than 99.8%, is essential for battery production. The Russia-Ukraine conflict has significantly impacted its supply chain.
events.description: Nickel, particularly class-1 nickel with a purity greater than 99.8%, is essential for battery production. The Russia-Ukraine conflict has significantly impacted its supply chain.

events.name: Class-1 nickel
events.wd_description: Highly pure-grade nickel required for battery production, with a purity greater than 99.8%.
events.description: Highly pure-grade nickel required for battery production, with a purity greater than 99.8%.

events.name: Class-2 nickel
events.wd_description: Nickel with less than 99.8% purity, which cannot be used in battery production without multistage processing.
events.description: Nickel with less than 99.8% purity, which cannot be used in battery production without multistage processing.

events.name: Impact of geopolitical conflicts on supply chain
events.wd_label: Impact of geopolitical conflicts on supply chain
events.wd_description: The Russia-Ukraine conflict has drastically affected the global supply chain of class-1 battery-grade nickel.
events.description: The Russia-Ukraine conflict has drastically affected the global supply chain of class-1 battery-grade nickel.

events.name: Nickel supply disruption
events.wd_description: The disruption in the supply of class-1 nickel due to the geopolitical conflict between Russia and Ukraine.
events.description: The disruption in the supply of class-1 nickel due to the geopolitical conflict between Russia and Ukraine.

events.name: Geopolitical tensions
events.wd_description: The ongoing geopolitical conflict between Russia and Ukraine, impacting various global supply chains.
events.description: The ongoing geopolitical conflict between Russia and Ukraine, impacting various global supply chains.

events.name: Cathode and anode material demands
events.wd_description: The demand for cathode and anode materials has surged, driven by the need to compensate for the high energy density of graphite anodes in battery cells.
events.description: The demand for cathode and anode materials has surged, driven by the need to compensate for the high energy density of graphite anodes in battery cells.

events.name: Cathode materials
events.wd_description: Materials used in the cathode of batteries, crucial for determining battery performance and material requirements.
events.description: Materials used in the cathode of batteries, crucial for determining battery performance and material requirements.

events.name: Anode materials
events.wd_description: Materials used in the anode of batteries, primarily graphite, which has seen increased demand alongside battery demand.
events.description: Materials used in the anode of batteries, primarily graphite, which has seen increased demand alongside battery demand.

events.name: Global distribution of EV battery materials
events.wd_label: Global distribution of EV battery materials
events.wd_description: The geographical concentration of critical materials required for the EV battery supply chain, dominated by specific countries.
events.description: The geographical concentration of critical materials required for the EV battery supply chain, dominated by specific countries.

events.name: Lithium supply
events.wd_description: The global supply of lithium, with China being a dominant supplier.
events.description: The global supply of lithium, with China being a dominant supplier.

events.name: Cobalt supply
events.wd_description: The global supply of cobalt, used in various battery-related applications.
events.description: The global supply of cobalt, used in various battery-related applications.

events.name: Nickel supply
events.wd_description: The global supply of nickel, especially class-1 nickel, crucial for battery production.
events.description: The global supply of nickel, especially class-1 nickel, crucial for battery production.

events.name: Graphite supply
events.wd_description: The global supply of graphite, essential for producing anodes, with China holding a significant market share.
events.description: The global supply of graphite, essential for producing anodes, with China holding a significant market share.

events.name: Influence of industrial policies
events.wd_description: The impact of industrial policies adopted by various nations to secure positions in the integrated battery supply chain.
events.description: The impact of industrial policies adopted by various nations to secure positions in the integrated battery supply chain.

events.name: China policy
events.wd_description: China's forward-thinking policies have secured a dominant position in the global EV industry, holding a 77% market share.
events.description: China's forward-thinking policies have secured a dominant position in the global EV industry, holding a 77% market share.

events.name: Japan policy
events.wd_description: Japan holds 4% of the global production capacity for EV batteries and has unveiled significant financial initiatives.
events.description: Japan holds 4% of the global production capacity for EV batteries and has unveiled significant financial initiatives.

events.name: Korea policy
events.wd_description: Korea holds 5% of the global production capacity and has launched significant financial initiatives to bolster its presence in the battery and EV industries.
events.description: Korea holds 5% of the global production capacity and has launched significant financial initiatives to bolster its presence in the battery and EV industries.

events.name: EU policy
events.wd_description: The European Union has invested significantly in R&D to develop an integrated battery manufacturing industry, though it will take time to establish supply chains.
events.description: The European Union has invested significantly in R&D to develop an integrated battery manufacturing industry, though it will take time to establish supply chains.

events.name: US policy
events.wd_description: The US has intensified efforts to develop indigenous supply chains for EVs and batteries, leveraging its automotive and mineral resource industries.
events.description: The US has intensified efforts to develop indigenous supply chains for EVs and batteries, leveraging its automotive and mineral resource industries.

events.name: Newcomers in EV battery production
events.wd_description: Newcomer countries like Indonesia and Thailand are strategically focusing on producing batteries and electric vehicles, leveraging their geographical advantages.
events.description: Newcomer countries like Indonesia and Thailand are strategically focusing on producing batteries and electric vehicles, leveraging their geographical advantages.

events.name: Indonesia
events.wd_description: Indonesia is focusing on battery and EV production, attracting investments from major EV producers due to its geographical advantages.
events.description: Indonesia is focusing on battery and EV production, attracting investments from major EV producers due to its geographical advantages.

events.name: Thailand
events.wd_description: Thailand is concentrating on producing batteries, EVs, and distributing materials, maintaining close ties with the Asian market to attract investments.
events.description: Thailand is concentrating on producing batteries, EVs, and distributing materials, maintaining close ties with the Asian market to attract investments.

events.name: Challenges in EV battery supply chain
events.wd_label: Challenges in EV battery supply chain
events.wd_description: The EV battery supply chain faces challenges such as availability of technical resources, quality assurance, critical material abundance, capital, and above-ground limitations.
events.description: The EV battery supply chain faces challenges such as availability of technical resources, quality assurance, critical material abundance, capital, and above-ground limitations.

events.name: Technical resources
events.wd_description: The availability of technical resources required for EV battery production.
events.description: The availability of technical resources required for EV battery production.

events.name: Quality assurance
events.wd_description: Ensuring the quality of materials and processes involved in the EV battery supply chain.
events.description: Ensuring the quality of materials and processes involved in the EV battery supply chain.

events.name: Critical material abundance
events.wd_description: The availability and abundance of critical materials like lithium, cobalt, and nickel.
events.description: The availability and abundance of critical materials like lithium, cobalt, and nickel.

events.name: Capital
events.wd_description: The financial resources required to develop and sustain the EV battery supply chain.
events.description: The financial resources required to develop and sustain the EV battery supply chain.

events.name: Above-ground limitations
events.wd_description: Physical and logistical limitations impacting the EV battery supply chain, including infrastructure and transportation.
events.description: Physical and logistical limitations impacting the EV battery supply chain, including infrastructure and transportation.
